productDescription: The Schrav embroidery crewneck is made from leftover bio cotton. It has a loose, box-like fit to give it that classic workwear look.

optionalInfo.production: All items are produced from exclusively leftover fabrics, put together at a local sewing company in Arnhem.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: Delivery in the Netherlands will take 1-3 days, to EU countries it will take between 3-5 days (on average).

productName: Schrav Unisex Embroidery Crewneck Dim Grey
